name: Downhill Overdrive
description:
Downhill Overdrive is a thrilling downhill drifting single player game. Enjoy the 80s aesthetic while blasting some synthwave in a drift modded car of your choice.

--------------INSTRUCTIONS--------------
WADS or Arrow Keys - Steer and Throttle
(Hold) Space bar - Drift (Hold for long drifts)
C - Look Behind
V - Alternate between cameras
H - Toggle Headlights
ESC - Pause Menu

--------------DISCLAIMER--------------
This game isn't complete, this is an early build with most of it's mechanics working in game. Do not expect a polished game or a bug free experience. I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it :>
